safaris.title: Hell's Gate National Park
safaris.description: A dramatic gorge in Kenya with towering cliffs, geothermal activity, wildlife, and thrilling activities like biking and hiking.

safaris.title: Maasai Mara
safaris.description: Vast savannah, iconic wildlife, annual migration, breathtaking landscapes, cultural Maasai encounters, unforgettable safari experiences, and nature's raw beauty.

safaris.title: Ambosseli National Park
safaris.description: Serene savannah in Kenya with iconic elephants, Mount Kilimanjaro backdrop, and abundant wildlife. A photographer's paradise with breathtaking sunsets.

safaris.title: The Cradle
safaris.description: A serene, picturesque bay with tranquil waters, lush vegetation, and stunning sunsets, offering a perfect escape to nature's embrace.

safaris.title: Lake Nakuru
safaris.description: Stunning soda lake in Kenya's Rift Valley, renowned for its flamingo population, diverse birdlife, and majestic wildlife.

hiking.title: Mt. Kenya Trail
hiking.description: Challenging and rewarding trek through Africa's second-highest peak, offering breathtaking scenery, unique flora, and awe-inspiring summit views.csufdu

hiking.title: Kijabe Hills
hiking.description: Scenic and challenging trail in Kenya offering breathtaking views, lush forests, rugged terrain, and an immersive outdoor experience.

hiking.title: Elephant Hill
hiking.description: Scenic trek through lush forests and rugged terrain, offering breathtaking views and a chance to spot elephants in their natural habitat.

hiking.title: Thomson Falls
hiking.description: Scenic trail in Kenya, leading to the mesmerizing Thomson Falls waterfall, offering breathtaking views and a tranquil nature experience.

hiking.title: Ololosokuan
hiking.description: Ololosokwan gorge in Ngong is where you walk through dry river beds, missing waterfalls, heart-stopping sheer cliff drops, and friendly baboons.

camping.title: El Karama Lodge
camping.description: El Karama Lodge in Sgana is a scenic retreat offering breathtaking views, relaxation, and a tranquil atmosphere in nature.

camping.title: Jangwani Camp
camping.description: Jangwani Camp Sagana is an adventurous camp located in Sagana, offering a wide range of outdoor activities and accommodations.

camping.title: Kiboko Camp
camping.description: Kiboko Camp is a wilderness retreat offering rustic accommodations, outdoor activities, and a serene natural environment for relaxation and exploration.

camping.title: Ashnil Mara Camp
camping.description: Ashnil Mara Camp is a luxurious safari camp in Kenya's Maasai Mara reserve, offering stunning wildlife views and excellent amenities.

camping.title: Leopard Hill Camp
camping.description: Leopard Hill Camp is a luxury safari camp offering an exclusive and immersive wildlife experience in a breathtaking natural setting.
